title: Spatio-temporal characterization of earthquake sequence ...
summary: This blog post discusses the use of point process modeling, specifically the ETAS model (Hawkes process), for spatio-temporal characterization of earthquake sequences. It highlights how these models can help understand interactions between earthquakes and spatial, temporal, and covariate effects.
usefulness_reason: Score 95 assigned because the post directly discusses "Point Process modeling," "Spatio-temporal" aspects, and specifically mentions "Hawkes process" which is a type of spatio-temporal point process, making it highly relevant to the query.
